definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Day dreamer, deceiver, lay waste the true believer.
sentences.chinese: 日夢想家，騙子，真正的信徒奠定浪費。

sentences.english: Throughout his entire life Rizal was nothing but an impenitent dreamer, a poet.
sentences.chinese: 裏澤爾一生就是一個從不後悔的夢想家，一個詩人。

sentences.english: Asia has yet to prove those old European dreamers wrong.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲仍需證明那些老歐洲夢想家們是錯的。

sentences.english: Associating with stupid is not necessarily stupid, it may be a dreamer.
sentences.chinese: 與笨人爲伍的不一定是笨人，也可能是夢想家。

sentences.english: You may say I'm a deamer.
sentences.chinese: 你可能說我是一個夢想家。

sentences.english: Pisceans are the dreamers of the world. But I am open to new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚座的人是世上的夢想家，但我樂於接受新主意。

sentences.english: The cool-headed reckoner is the stern chastiser of the ecstatic visionary.
sentences.chinese: 頭腦冷靜的計算者，是夢想家的嚴厲懲罰人。
奧巴馬的母親是一個夢想家。

sentences.english: Think about all of the creative people around you. Who are the dreamers?
sentences.chinese: 想一下你周圍有創造力的人，誰是夢想家？

sentences.english: Dreamers are not content with being merely mediocre, because no one ever dreams of going halfway.
sentences.chinese: 夢想家不甘平庸，因爲沒有人想半途而廢。

sentences.english: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers .
sentences.chinese: 成就大業著皆是大夢想家。

definition: Descendants of the Dragon (i.e. Han Chinese)
Simon Yam Tat-Wah (1955-), Hong Kong actor and film producer
to brave the wind and the billows (idiom); to have high ambitions
Luo Zhixiang or Show Luo or Alan Luo (1979-), Taiwanese pop star
"Becks", nickname of British footballer David Beckham (see 貝克漢姆|贝克汉姆[Bei4 ke4 han4 mu3])
